name: The Last Hope (itch) (mrXtlh)
description:
in the name of god

hi and welcome, this is the first part of the game that i'm working , The Last Hope

in this game you need to help a group of survivors to survive The Elven Invasion 

they have close to no chance of surviving and you only have a voice in their head and feelings to give them , and some of them might not trust the voice so you are up to a really hard challenge , can you help them survive ? 

P.S.

this is only the beginning of development !

we also have a discord for the game and you can get news about game and behind scene ,this is the discord link

also if you see any misspelling or have problem with the game please let me know in discord
